titles.title: Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God of Hosts

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God of hosts, Eternal King, by the heav'ns and earth adored! Angels and archangels sing, chanting everlastingly to the blessed Trinity.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Since by Thee were all things made, and in Thee do all things live, be to Thee all honor paid; praise to Thee let all things give, singing everlastingly To the blessed Trinity.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Thousands, tens of thousands stand, spirits blest before Thy throne, speeding thence at Thy command; and, when Thy command is done, singing everlastingly to the blessed Trinity.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Cherubim and seraphim veil their faces with their wings; eyes of angels are too dim to behold the King of kings, while they sing eternally to the blessed Trinity.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Thee, apostles, prophets, Thee, Thee, the noble martyr band, praise with solemn jubilee, Thee, the Church in ev'ry land; singing everlastingly to the blessed Trinity.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Alleluia! Lord, to Thee, Father, Son, and Holy Ghost, Three in One, and One in Three, join we with the heav'enly host, singing everlastingly to the blessed Trinity.
